description:
Sanada Yukimura encounters someone he thought was long dead. Meanwhile, Keiji’s contemplation of the past leads to a decision, and Mori Motonari and Takenaka Hanbei conclude their negotiations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Azuchijou no Bourei!? Yukimura o Osou Nageki to Ma no Houkou!
The Ghost of Azuchi Castle?! The Lamentation and Howl of Evil That Assail Yukimura!
安土城の亡霊!? 幸村を襲う嘆きと魔の咆哮!
